title: Ziggs has ended up becoming an auto-loss now...
body:
As the title says...

{{champion:115}} is currently sitting at a 46%-49% win rate:
http://na.op.gg/champion/ziggs/statistics/mid
http://champion.gg/champion/Ziggs/Middle

As a level 7 {{champion:115}}, it's sad to see he has ended up becoming an auto-loss troll pick; he is badly in need of buffs to be made a viable champion.

Q: Bouncing Bomb

Mana costs decreased from 50/55/60/65/70 to 30/35/40/45/50

W: Satchel Charge

Demolition Threshold increased from 25/27.5/30/32.5/35% to 25/30/35/40/45%

R: Mega Inferno Bomb

Damage increased from 200/300/400 to 300/400/500
